title: Microsoft Silently Patches Windows LNK Flaw After Years of Active Exploitation
description: Microsoft has silently plugged a security flaw that has been exploited by several threat actors since 2017 as part of the company's November 2025 Patch Tuesday updates, according to ACROS Security's 0patch.
